ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

ElementDescription: Sex of the subject
Notes: M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: Did subject meet assessment requirements for inclusion in the study?
Notes: 1 = Yes ; 0 = No ; 888 = Not assessed - patient was ineligible

ElementDescription: Did the subject provide a written signed informed consent form/forms (IRB/IEC specific) prior to the initiation of any protocol required procedures?
Notes: 1 = Yes ; 0 = No ; 888 = Not assessed - patient was ineligible

ElementDescription: Is the subject between the ages of 18-68 inclusive?
Notes: 1 = Yes ; 0 = No ; 888 = Not assessed - patient was ineligible

ElementDescription: Does the subject have a high school degree or equivalent?
Notes: 1 = Yes ; 0 = No ; 888 = Not assessed - patient was ineligible

ElementDescription: Can the subject read and speak English?
Notes: 1 = Yes ; 0 = No ; 888 = Not assessed - patient was ineligible

ElementDescription: Does the subject have an overall score of 20 or higher on the Beck Depression Inventory?
Notes: 1 = Yes ; 0 = No ; 888 = Not assessed - patient was ineligible

ElementDescription: Does the subject have current suicidal ideation with intent/plan (answered 3 or 4 to question 9 of the BDI)
Has the subject ever suffered a head or brain injury?
Notes: 1 = Yes ; 0 = No ; 888 = Not assessed - patient was ineligible

ElementDescription: Does the subject have any current psychiatric illness?
Notes: 1 = Yes ; 0 = No ; 888 = Not assessed - patient was ineligible

ElementDescription: Does the subject have any current or previous neurological illness?
Notes: 1 = Yes ; 0 = No ; 888 = Not assessed - patient was ineligible

ElementDescription: Does the subject meet criteria for substance abuse?
Notes: 1 = Yes ; 0 = No ; 888 = Not assessed - patient was ineligible

ElementDescription: Does the subject suffer from frequent or severe headaches?
Notes: 1 = Yes ; 0 = No ; 888 = Not assessed - patient was ineligible

ElementDescription: Is the subject currently taking any psychotropic medications?
Notes: 1 = Yes ; 0 = No ; 888 = Not assessed - patient was ineligible

ElementDescription: Does the subject have any contraindications for MRI imaging such as metal in the body (confirmed at the MRI visit on the MRI screening checklist)?
Notes: 1 = Yes ; 0 = No ; 888 = Not assessed - patient was ineligible

ElementDescription: If female, is the subject currently pregnant, planning to become pregant in the next month, or breastfeeding? (to be confirmed by urine pregnancy screen right before the MRI scan).
Notes: 1 = Yes ; 0 = No ; 888 = Not assessed - patient was ineligible

ElementDescription: Miscellaneous comments on study, interview, methodology relevant to this form data
Visit name
Subject's gender OTHER describe
Study
Visit type
